mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Pierpont, Francis H.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Wheeling, May 7th 1863. Col N. Wilkinson 6th Va Clarksburg Va You will please call on the AQM at Clarksburg to furnish such supplies of every kind to the Militia there now in service as they actually need subsistence & camp furniture & shoes if they need any. Jones sign the requisition Signed FHP [Francis H. Pierpont] Copy
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Pierpont, Francis H.
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Clarksburg, (West) Virginia
Wilkinson, Nathan
